title: Hexblade

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curse a player at night. They will be framed permanently if they are not Coven or Insurgency, but gain Detection immunity if they are. If they die the night you curse them, they will appear to be your role upon death.
- Duel a player, killing them. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will be notified if they gain Detection immunity, though you will not be notified that you gave it to them.
- When dueling, you may go cautious. If you target a non-Good faction role while cautious, you will not attack them, and the charge will not be lost.
- You do not have access to the Coven factional chat, but the Coven know you exist.
- You may win with either faction.
- If you somehow gain access to a factional chat, you may perform false abilities.
- With the Necronomicon, you gain infinite uses of duels and both roleblock and prevention immunity. You can gain the Necronomicon even if the Coven didn't spawn.

*This town is unworthy of my blade... I care not who takes me in, as long as I get my revenge.*
